title: Creamy Pasta with Peas

ingredients.content: 2 oz Emmental cheese, cut into pieces (½ in.)
3 ½ oz organic heavy whipping cream
10 ½ oz dried pasta, e.g. farfalle (bow tie pasta)

preparations.content: Place Emmental cheese into mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a serving bowl and set aside.
Place onions and garlic into mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add water, cream, milk, stock, salt and nutmeg and cook <b>5 min/212°F/speed 1<b>.
Add pasta and cook for <b>time indicated on package /212°F//speed <b>.
Add peas and mix <b>3 min/160°F//speed <b> while stirring gently with spatula through hole in mixing bowl lid. Transfer to serving bowl with cheese and mix with spatula before serving.

hintsAndTricks: Can be garnished with pan-fried pancetta.
Emmental is a type of hard Swiss cheese with many holes in it, similar to Gruyère.
